Welcome 👋
I'm Ayush Chauhan

i am into R|

About Me

About Me

I'm Ayush

Student

I am a highly motivated high school graduate with a dynamic array of interests spanning Computer Science, Social Entrepreneurship, and Education. These passions have been cultivated through a combination of academic exploration, personal experiences, and a genuine curiosity about the world around me.


In the realm of Computer Science, I have not only excelled in coursework but have actively sought out opportunities to apply my skills. I've engaged in collaborative coding projects and delved into various programming languages and innovative technologies. My proficiency extends beyond the classroom, as I have conducted research and published a paper on Human-Computer Interaction and AI Ethics. I've also presented my findings to audiences of over 400 people on topics such as Convolutional Neural Networks, Long-Short Term Memory Networks, and Gated Recurrent Units. Currently, I am immersed in Large Language Model Research, aiming to contribute to the field and publish my work soon.


On the social entrepreneurship front, my journey has been shaped by a desire to impact communities positively. Drawing inspiration from real-world issues, I have initiated and participated in projects that address societal challenges. Whether organizing fundraisers for Edukul or collaborating with like-minded individuals on community-driven initiatives such as School Simplified or GreenBhumi, I am committed to leveraging entrepreneurial principles for the betterment of society.


In the field of education, my dedication as a student goes beyond academic pursuits; it is deeply rooted in a personal connection to the transformative power of education. Visiting my village annually, I witnessed children who were unable to access schools and were compelled to work as laborers in shops. This stark reality illuminated the profound lack of educational opportunities. It was a poignant realization that something my mother had always emphasized and sacrificed for was a privilege out of reach for many in my community. This realization led to the founding of Edukul in my freshman year, aiming to provide children across different Indian states with resources such as weekly teaching sessions, stationery drives, and more.


Fueling my pursuits is a global outlook that stems from a genuine appreciation for cultural diversity and a curiosity about different perspectives. This worldview is not only reflected in my academic choices but also in my eagerness to embrace diverse learning experiences, such as participating in international summer programs, engaging in cross-cultural collaborations, or volunteering in global initiatives.


Looking ahead, I am excited about channeling my multifaceted passions into meaningful innovation and social impact during my future studies and career. I am particularly drawn to projects and initiatives integrating technology, entrepreneurship, and education to address pressing societal challenges.


Away from the academic and professional spheres, I find solace and inspiration in the world of visual arts. During my free time, you'll likely find me immersed in the creative process, painting, and expressing myself visually. This artistic outlet serves as a form of relaxation and contributes to my holistic approach to personal and professional development.


Feel free to explore my Visual Arts Resume below if that's something that interests you :D


You are in the 30% gang if you made it up till here. Cheers! 🎉

Resume

The Best Four Years of my Life

What made my schooling experience one of the few memories I'll cherish forever? Let's see :)

Grade 9th

2019-2020

St. Teresa School, Indirapuram


Grade 9 was all about embracing a fresh start in high school. I felt a mix of excitement and uncertainty as I navigated the new environment, met new people, and laid the foundation for my high school journey while balancing my academics.

Grade 10th

2020-2021

St. Teresa School, Indirapuram


In Grade 10, I broadened my horizons, delving into challenging subjects and exploring new interests. Notably, I felt the absence of a Tech & Entrepreneurship Club and decided to establish the TechVenture Nexus Club. By my senior year, it had grown to 78 members, reshaping my high school experience.

Grade 11th

2021-2022

St. Teresa School, Indirapuram


Grade 11 brought intense academic challenges and the beginning of college and career planning. It was a year of acquiring a deeper understanding of my goals and the realization that my story was becoming more intricate.

Grade 12th

2022-2023

St. Teresa School, Indirapuram


Grade 12 marks the final chapter of high school. It is a time for reflection and balancing the excitement of graduation with the responsibilities of completing coursework with flying colours. My high school story is concluding, but my life's story is ready for a new, exciting chapter.

Research Endeavours

Human-Computer Interaction and AI Ethics

This research investigates the societal impact of AI/ML applications and evaluates ChatGPT's design for responsible AI development.

Mentor Paper

Long Short-Term Memory Recurrent Neural Networks

Human-like Text Generation with Long Short-Term Memory Recurrent Neural Networks and Gated Recurrent Unit.

Mentor Paper

Large Language Model

In progress: Enhancing LLM's performance via model-agnostic clustering & dynamic temperature sampling.
